title: Error using makefile on Rust 1.0 on FreeBSD 10.1
body:
I am attempting to build Rust version 1.0 on FreeBSD 10.1 for the first time. I've never tried to build Rust before and am somewhat new to FreeBSD (typically I use Linux and OSX).

Please let me know if there's any additional information I can provide.

Here is my system information:

```
# uname -a
FreeBSD vultr 10.1-RELEASE-p9 FreeBSD 10.1-RELEASE-p9 #0: Tue Apr  7 01:09:46 UTC 2015     root@amd64-builder.daemonology.net:/usr/obj/usr/src/sys/GENERIC  amd64
```

Here is the output of `./configure`:
